text: Naa ʋoluma, gè devei veeni ga fitiligi ɠa ʋɛɛna nɔ feya, ti Zeluzalɛme taa ziɠidaʋɛti daaɠulu, aisa dooɠo foloi ʋa zeeli, ti laa mina lao, kɛni dooɠo foloi a leʋena. Gè nà-botiɠɛ nui tanigaa zeini taa ziɠidaʋɛti koba, ga ti ɗa wɛlɛ náti ma, nii a kɛ kasɔ nɔpɛ ge mina lɛ Zeluzalɛme dooɠo foloi.
